name: Shake Sliders
description:
Welcome to Shake Sliders, the most efficient diner in the city!  You have just accepted a role to serve people at this fine establishment and are starting out on day 1.  Due to the requirements of this position, many employees before you have not been able to make it beyond day 1.  Your goal is to serve the customers what they want. We have 3 excellent products on the menu that have customers coming back for more: our super deluxe cheeseburger, our unique, original recipe fizzy cola, and our delicious strawberry milkshake (made with real strawberries)!  If you give the customer the wrong food, we're going to dock your pay. If you serve them well, we'll give you $10 for each customer satisfied.   Keep in mind, if you let down just 1 customer and don't serve in a reasonable time, then we may have to part ways.

NOTE: This game was created to compete in a 48-hr game jam but the deadline was missed so I finished what I had when time was afforded to me.  Feel free to play this simple <10 minute game inspired by the 1980s arcade game, Tapper, that I used to play growing up.
